categories: Category:Commerce and labor guilds and unions

nodes.text: The Ugnaught Mechanics Union, or Ugnaught Union for short, was a negotiating body formed by three Ugnaught tribes—the Irden, Botrut, and Isced—to negotiate with the other guilds of Cloud City. Boss Ugnor brought the Ugnaught leaders together with Ecclessis Figg, the founder of Cloud City, to create the Union, and Ugnor was in turn made the "Ufflor o' Ufflors", the lead negotiator for all three tribes.
The primary meeting location for the union was on Cloud City in the Mining Quarter, but the guild also met at the Mechanics Union Auxiliary Meeting Hall on the Ugnaught Surface.
